Module kivakit.resource
Package com.telenav.kivakit.resource.reading

Class ResourceReader

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.resource.reading.ResourceReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.AsString
public class ResourceReader extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.AsString
Resource reader provides a variety of convenient ways of reading a resource, including as an array of bytes (readBytes()), as a single string (asString()), as lines (readLines()), and as objects with (readList(ProgressReporter, Converter), readSet(ProgressReporter, Converter), and readObjects(ProgressReporter, Converter, Consumer)). To read the resource as text, a Reader can be retrieved with textReader().

Reading

  • asString()
  • readBytes()
  • readLines()
  • readLines(ProgressReporter, Consumer)
  • readLines(ProgressReporter)
  • readObjects(ProgressReporter, Converter, Consumer)
  • readList(ProgressReporter, Converter)
  • readSet(ProgressReporter, Converter)
  • readText(ProgressReporter)
  • textReader()
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
